featured.text: Whether they wielded rods or pea shooters, knockers-up became 18 throughout the United Kingdom.
British workers thus relied on a human alarm clock known as a “knocker-up.”

definition.zh_def: 門環；用於敲門的裝置，通常由金屬製成。
definition.en_def: A device, typically made of metal, used for knocking on a door.
definition.example: She gave the door a firm knock with the brass knocker.
